sentences.en: But quantum physics has shattered some of our cornerstone beliefs.
sentences.cn: 但是,量子理论已经打碎了我们信仰的基石.

sentences.en: His theory of justice was elaborate and forms a cornerstone of his philosophical edifice.
sentences.cn: 他详尽阐述的正义理论形成了其哲学体系的基石.

sentences.en: Indeed, it has come to be the cornerstone of modern thinking on international trade.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 它已成为现代国际贸易理论的奠基石.

sentences.en: NASS is the cornerstone of the new era of large - scale network computing.
sentences.cn: NASS是大规模网络计算新时期的基石.

sentences.en: Quality and taste, and Matsu is the cornerstone of the product!
sentences.cn: 质量与品味是金马产品的基石!

sentences.en: Research is the cornerstone of the profession.
Staff's growth, team's cooperation, is cornerstone which the enterprise succeeds.
sentences.cn: 员工的成长, 团队的合作, 是企业成功的基石.

sentences.en: Surplus value theory is the cornerstone of Marx economy theory.
sentences.cn: 剩余价值理论是马克思经济理论的基石.

sentences.en: The archaeologists unearthed a cornerstone bearing a Greek inscription.
sentences.cn: 考古学家们控掘出一块刻有希腊语铭文的奠基石.

sentences.en: The canvas Yin Xiang Ri Chu is the cornerstone of impressionistic paintings.
sentences.cn: 《印象日出》这幅油画,是印象派绘画的奠基石.

sentences.en: The doctrine of surplus value is the cornerstone of Marx's economic theory.
sentences.cn: 剩余价值学说是马克思经济理论的基石.

sentences.en: The founders of our religion made this a cornerstone of morality.
sentences.cn: 我们宗教的创始人把这看作是道德的基石.

sentences.en: The industry of real estate is a cornerstone for economy.
sentences.cn: 房地产业是我国国民经济的重要的支柱产业之一.

sentences.en: The mayor laid the cornerstone of the new library.
The stone which the builders rejected has become the cornerstone of the building.
sentences.cn: 一块曾被建筑师嫌弃的石头竟成了基石.

sentences.en: Today, the human element remains a cornerstone of our success.
sentences.cn: 直到今天, 人的因素,仍然是我们成功的重要基石.

trans.tran_cn: 基石，基础，最重要的部分
trans.tran_en: something that is extremely important because everything else depends on it
